  PlayerUnknown's BattleGrounds 
</h1>
<p>
  PlayerUnknown's BattleGrounds aka PUBG is a Battle Royale (BR), meaning the game is set on a massive battlefield where 100 players fight either alone, or in teams, to be the last one remaining.
  The BR genre exploded in popularity right around the release of PUBG in 2016 and PUBG dominated the scene together with Fortnite.
</p></div><div _ngcontent-sc72="" class="socilal-links-wrapper"><gl-social-links _ngcontent-sc72="" _nghost-sc71=""><div _ngcontent-sc71="" class="social-links"><ul _ngcontent-sc71="" class="social-items"><li _ngcontent-sc71="" class="social-item facebook"><a _ngcontent-sc71="" role="button" class="fb-action"><svg _ngcontent-sc71="" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="30" height="30" viewbox="0 0 30 30"><path _ngcontent-sc71="" d="M12 0c-6.627 0-12 5.373-12 12s5.373 12 12 12 12-5.373 12-12-5.373-12-12-12zm3 8h-1.35c-.538

<p>
   
</p>
<h2>
  What is PUBG?
</h2>
<p>
  PUBG is a Battle Royal game, or a survival game, where 100 players are thrown into combat and the winner is the last one standing. The game is played either solo or in teams, with the team
  based side of the game being more popular. The games themselves are fast and actionpacked, with loads of exciting and nail biting moments. All players start each game with only the basics, just
  to start scavenging for weapons and different types of utility to help them overcome their enemies. What makes PUBG unique compared to other similar games is the first person view it offers and
  as such becomes more realistic than some other BR games. The ability to use several different types of vehicles also stands out. Different strategies can be used to overcome the other 99
  players, which range from aggressive ones where enemies are taken out, to pure defensive ones where you wait your opposition out. There is however a limiting factor here - the storm, which
  hurts players in it, but there is a barrier that protects players from it during the game. The protective barrier does shrink in size the longer the game progresses.. Eventually the space will
  be really, really small and if you step outside you will quickly be eliminated. That’s the basic idea of PUBG and if you wish to learn more about the game as a whole we recommend you head over
  to our guides section.
</p>
<h2>
  What is a Battle Royale? 
</h2>
<p>
  A Battle Royale game is any game where the last person or team standing wins the game. Seemingly based off of the Japanese novel by Koushun Takami, Battle Royale, as well as the more popular
  Hunger Games series by Suzanne Collins where the main focus of the plot revolves around a group of children who are thrown into a battleground and forced to kill each other with weapons and
  tools that are scattered around the area, where the remaining (usually one) child is allowed to return to their home. Yes this may seem a little grotesque and unfortunately, it is. When you
  consider it is a video game however, then it requires a lot of skill and perfect reaction time to consistently be the one on top. Battle Royale brings a whole new style of gameplay for player
  and viewers, since every game is different and there is a lot happening around the huge map all the time. 
</p>
<h2>
  Can you play PUBG cross-platform?
</h2>
<p>
  PUBG is available on PC, Mobile, Xbox One and PS4. However, only Xbox One and PS4 can be played cross-platform, while the others are restricted.
</p>
<h2>
  Can you bet on PUBG?
</h2>
<p>
  Yes, most betting sites offer odds on PUBG. However a lack of big tournaments makes it hard to bet on PUBG very often, but when the biggest events kick off you can be assured there will be more
  than a few options on where to bet. To read more about operators who offer odds on the game you can head to our operator reviews under the betting section.
</p>
<h2>
  How do I learn more about PUBG?
</h2>
<p>
  PUBG is an exciting game and if you haven’t given it a shot yet, we think you should. No matter if you are interested in watching, playing or betting on the game - we got a guide for it. Go
  check them out as it will help you along the way and make the transition easier. PUBG is a fantastic game with an enormous depth, even if the basic idea is as simple as it gets.
</p></div></div></div></div><div _ngcontent-sc74="" class="container-outer"><div _ngcontent-sc74="" class="game-news-wrapper"><h2 _ngcontent-sc74="" class="game-intro-cards-title">ALL<!---->  News
